manifest.name: Kingdom Builder Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Rule your domain with quests focused on management, diplomacy, and building a better realm (home).

quests.title: Royal Decree: Tidy Room
quests.description: Issue a royal decree (and follow it) to tidy your personal chambers (bedroom).

quests.title: Manage the Royal Treasury
quests.description: Help create a simple weekly budget or savings plan.

quests.title: Diplomatic Mission
quests.description: Perform a kind act for a member of a neighboring kingdom (a sibling or parent).

quests.title: Fortify the Defenses
quests.description: Help with a household repair or maintenance task.

quests.title: Survey the Lands
quests.description: Help with yard work, like raking leaves or watering plants.

quests.title: Train the Royal Guard
quests.description: Do 15 minutes of physical exercise or practice a sport.

markets.title: The Royal Armoury
markets.description: Fine regalia and equipment befitting a ruler.

gameAssets.name: Royal Crown
gameAssets.description: A magnificent crown for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Royal Scepter
gameAssets.description: A symbol of power for your avatar to hold.

gameAssets.name: Royal Feast
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: gets to choose what's for dinner.
